title: I got 60 percent in 10th but I have to take science what should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depend on which city you ate staying. You have got first division and you can get science in any state board school or in cbse also. Those school which dont make merit list for class 11 can give you admission.CBSEschools in all small cities are giving admission with this percentage.

First of all with this percentage you can't take science but there are some exceptional cases in which you can take like in some school and yes there are one more way you can and that's called donation if you can afford.
